author: stack
msg: HADOOP-2718 Copy Constructor HBaseConfiguration(Configuration) will override hbase
configurations if argumant is not an instance of HBaseConfiguration (Second version).

author: jdcasey
msg: Adding the concept of recommended stacktrace hints for reported errors, and add the ability to directly access the list of exceptions that actually hit the error reporter (instead of having to use MavenExecutionResult.getExceptions() in conjunction with findReportedException(..) to unwrap them.

author: stack
msg: HADOOP-2718 Copy Constructor HBaseConfiguration(Configuration) will override
hbase configurations if argumant is not an instance of HBaseConfiguration.
Adding back again (v2 of conf patch).

author: jeremias
msg: Renamed FopEvent to Event as suggested by Simon.
EventProducerCollectorTask.java now reads the EventSeverity from a doclet tag.
Added generation of EventProducer translations (including simple merging, no validation, yet)
Added a simple EventListener implementation that uses EventFormatter to convert the events to human-readable, localized messages that are sent to the log via Commons Logging.
